objects.description: [Shedun](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0010) "uses publicly available exploits that perform the rooting function. ShiftyBug, for example, comes packed with at least eight of them in an effort to enable itself to root as many device as possible.".

external_references.description: Michael Bentley. (2015, November 4). Lookout discovers new trojanized adware; 20K popular apps caught in the crossfire. Retrieved December 21, 2016.
